String.Source: Yet in the end he chose you.
String.Dest: 然而最后他选了你。

String.Source: Any interesting news or rumors?
String.Dest: 有什么有趣的消息和传言吗？

String.Source: Any interesting news or rumors?
String.Dest: 有什么有趣的消息和传言吗？

String.Source: Any interesting news or rumors?
String.Dest: 有什么有趣的消息和传言吗？

String.Source: Any interesting news or rumors?
String.Dest: 有什么有趣的消息和传言吗？

String.Source: Any interesting news or rumors?
String.Dest: 有什么有趣的消息和传言吗？

String.Source: Any interesting news or rumors?
String.Dest: 有什么有趣的消息和传言吗？

String.Source: Any interesting news or rumors?
String.Dest: 有什么有趣的消息和传言吗？

String.Source: Given your history, I'd say your opposition to war is far more personal.
String.Dest: 自从知道了你的经历，我不得不说你对战争的异议是出于个人因素的。

String.Source: Given your history, I'd say your opposition to war is far more personal.
String.Dest: 自从知道了你的经历，我不得不说你对战争的异议是出于个人因素的。

String.Source: So you fancied the man. Did you try and speak to him?
String.Dest: 所以你让那男的为你着迷了。你尝试过跟他交流吗？

String.Source: So you fancied the man. Did you try and speak to him?
String.Dest: 所以你让那男的为你着迷了。你尝试过跟他交流吗？

String.Source: So you fancied the man. Did you try and speak to him?
String.Dest: 所以你让那男的为你着迷了。你尝试过跟他交流吗？

String.Source: That means he was available. You should've pounced.
String.Dest: 看来他还有用，你本该把他抓回来。

String.Source: That means he was available. You should've pounced.
String.Dest: 看来他还有用，你本该把他抓回来。

String.Source: A noble has no business associating with Darkies.
String.Dest: 一个贵族不可能和暗精灵有商业往来。

String.Source: A noble has no business associating with Darkies.
String.Dest: 一个贵族不可能和暗精灵有商业往来。

String.Source: A noble has no business associating with Darkies.
String.Dest: 一个贵族不可能和暗精灵有商业往来。

String.Source: A noble has no business associating with Darkies.
String.Dest: 一个贵族不可能和暗精灵有商业往来。

String.Source: A noble has no business associating with Darkies.
String.Dest: 一个贵族不可能和暗精灵有商业往来。

String.Source: You're better off without such a sentimental fool.
String.Dest: 沒了这个多愁善感的傻瓜，你会过得更好。.

String.Source: Tell me about Belyn.
String.Dest: 告诉我贝林的事情。

String.Source: Tell me about Belyn.
String.Dest: 告诉我贝林的事情。

String.Source: Tell me about Belyn.
String.Dest: 告诉我贝林的事情。

String.Source: Tell me about Belyn.
String.Dest: 告诉我贝林的事情。

String.Source: Really? Have you ever tried working the fields?
String.Dest: 真的？你试过种地吗？

String.Source: Really? Have you ever tried working the fields?
String.Dest: 真的？你试过种地吗？

String.Source: I agree. We Nords are nothing but milk-drinkers.
String.Dest: 我同意。我们诺德人都是没用的胆小鬼。

String.Source: He was right. You're beautiful and in full bloom.
String.Dest: 他说的没错，你真是如盛开的花朵一般美丽。

String.Source: Why your morals?
String.Dest: 因为你的道德观？

String.Source: Why your morals?
String.Dest: 因为你的道德观？

String.Source: I can relate. I sometimes say things I shouldn't. You're ugly, by the way.
String.Dest: 我会说。有时候我会说些不该说的话。顺便说一下，你真丑。

String.Source: I can relate. I sometimes say things I shouldn't. You're ugly, by the way.
String.Dest: 我会说。有时候我会说些不该说的话。顺便说一下，你真丑。

String.Source: Where does the war factor in all of this?
String.Dest: 这一切中战争的因素在哪里？

String.Source: Where does the war factor in all of this?
String.Dest: 这一切中战争的因素在哪里？

String.Source: Where does the war factor in all of this?
String.Dest: 这一切中战争的因素在哪里？

String.Source: Where does the war factor in all of this?
String.Dest: 这一切中战争的因素在哪里？

String.Source: I want to return to my earlier questions.
String.Dest: 我想回到我刚才的问题。

String.Source: Very well.
String.Dest: 很好。

String.Source: I agree. Nords act tough but they are all a bunch of milk-drinkers.
String.Dest: 我同意。诺德人装得很凶可实际上都是些吃奶的货。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: Tell me about you and the Nord.
String.Dest: 说说你和那个诺德人的故事

String.Source: Tell me about you and the Nord.
String.Dest: 说说你和那个诺德人的故事

String.Source: I myself am of questionable morals and mind. We should form a guild.
String.Dest: 我这人的品行和智商也就你这水平的，咱俩应该组织一个公会。

String.Source: I myself am of questionable morals and mind. We should form a guild.
String.Dest: 我这人的品行和智商也就你这水平的，咱俩应该组织一个公会。

String.Source: I myself am of questionable morals and mind. We should form a guild.
String.Dest: 我这人的品行和智商也就你这水平的，咱俩应该组织一个公会。

String.Source: I myself am of questionable morals and mind. We should form a guild.
String.Dest: 我这人的品行和智商也就你这水平的，咱俩应该组织一个公会。

String.Source: Sounds like a dashing man.
String.Dest: 听起来是个莽撞人。

String.Source: Sounds like a dashing man.
String.Dest: 听起来是个莽撞人。

String.Source: Sounds like a dashing man.
String.Dest: 听起来是个莽撞人。

String.Source: Young love feels so trivial, but more essential than anything important ever could be.
String.Dest: 初恋很烦琐, 但比其他的东西都重要.

String.Source: The fool went and got himself slain not a week after the war began. I never even got a letter.
String.Dest: 那傻子去参战然后在开战不到一周就被杀了。我甚至都没收到一封信。

String.Source: It's a shame what's happened to the Shatter-Shield family this past year. We've had our differences, but I never wished them ill will.
String.Dest: 碎盾家族这一年的遭遇真是惨痛。我们是有些不和，但我从没有希望他们倒霉。

String.Source: And for that, the title of "noble" couldn't be more befitting of him, while all the riches in the world could never make it appropriate for you.
String.Dest: 由此一来，“贵族”的头衔对他而言真是再合适不过，至于你，就算你拥有世界上所有的财产都不能算得上是“贵族”。

String.Source: And for that, the title of "noble" couldn't be more befitting of him, while all the riches in the world could never make it appropriate for you.
String.Dest: 由此一来，“贵族”的头衔对他而言真是再合适不过，至于你，就算你拥有世界上所有的财产都不能算得上是“贵族”。

String.Source: When I saw him I dropped my basket of flowers. Embarrassed, I scrambled to pick them up off the stone.
String.Dest: 一看到他我就把花篮给掉在地上了。我手忙脚乱地把它们从地上捡起来，挺丢脸的。

String.Source: When I saw him I dropped my basket of flowers. Embarrassed, I scrambled to pick them up off the stone.
String.Dest: 一看到他我就把花篮给掉在地上了。我手忙脚乱地把它们从地上捡起来，挺丢脸的。

String.Source: And yet you remind me of him in some ways. Callow, unhinged, willing to die for ideals that I had long since outgrown.
String.Dest: 而且，你让我想起了他。乳臭未干，脑袋有洞，愿意为那些我早就放下的理想而牺牲。

String.Source: I oppose war because it is senseless and inefficient, not because I want to lie in my bed cuddling a dead man's bones.
String.Dest: 我反对战争不是因为我想抱着死人的骨头入睡，而是因为它毫无意义也毫无用处。

String.Source: That's who he chose in the end. His people, and his king.
String.Dest: 那是他最终选择之人。他的人们，他的王。

String.Source: That's who he chose in the end. His people, and his king.
String.Dest: 那是他最终选择之人。他的人们，他的王。

String.Source: Candlehearth Hall may be a cozy and elegant place to have a drink, but the Cornerclub has style.
String.Dest: 对于小酌一杯来说，烛炉堂旅店也许是个舒适而优雅的地方。但街角吧别有风味。

String.Source: All that was left was a single Dragon's Tongue. I was about to reach for it, when a hand gently plucked it off the ground.
String.Dest: 只剩下最后一根龙舌兰了。我正要摘它，另一个人就轻轻把它从地上拔起来了。

String.Source: All that was left was a single Dragon's Tongue. I was about to reach for it, when a hand gently plucked it off the ground.
String.Dest: 只剩下最后一朵龙舌兰了。当一只手轻轻将它从地上摘下来的时候，我正要将手伸向它。

String.Source: As Adisla can attest, my cousin does have a bit of a temper. Only unlike her, I have no reason to fear him.
String.Dest: 阿蒂斯拉可以证实，我的表兄确实有点坏脾气。只不过不像她，我没有理由怕他。

String.Source: I beg your pardon! Even a child knows better than to leave such insults on their tongue!
String.Dest: 请你原谅我！就算小孩也不该蠢到说出这样冒犯的话！

String.Source: No, they're not. Those moments are poison. If only there were a cure. Just look at me, still in love with a ghost.
String.Dest: 不，他们不是。那些时光是味毒药。但愿能有治愈的方法。看看我，还在爱着一个幽灵。

String.Source: No. Just thinking about those days with Balrund at the Cornerclub, and how they made me feel young again.
String.Dest: 不。我只是在想着跟包伦德一起呆在街角吧的这些日子，以及他们如何让我觉得自己又年轻了。

String.Source: Strange feelings swelled within me. Anticipation, anxiety, as if the world had shrunk into a single person...and yet it never felt so vast.
String.Dest: 奇怪的感觉在我的心中膨胀。期待，焦虑，好像那个人就是整个世界……而我从没感觉过世界是如此广阔。

String.Source: Oh, sorry about that stranger. I sometimes prattle on like that, use my outer voice to say things I want to keep in.
String.Dest: 哦，对于那个生人的事儿我得道歉……有的时候我就爱七扯八扯，把一些本想憋在心的事情都说漏了。

String.Source: I was standing at the docks when his ship pulled in. His name was Balrund. He was a noble's son.
String.Dest: 当他的船靠岸的时候，我正站在码头。他叫包伦德，是一名贵族的儿子。

String.Source: Oh, because I was considered a harlot, having bewitched the heart of one of their sons.
String.Dest: 哦，因为我被当做了一个娼妇，蛊惑了他们一个儿子的心。

String.Source: Belyn is a good farmer and a good Dunmer. Many find it surprising to see a Nord woman under his employ, but not if you know Belyn.
String.Dest: 在暗精灵里，贝林算是一个好人，一个优秀的农夫。很多人可能会觉得奇怪为什么一个诺德女人愿意受雇于他，但那是因为他们不知道贝林的为人。

String.Source: A guild of what? Madness and debauchery? I believe we used to have one of those here. It was called the "Stormcloak Rebellion."
String.Dest: 啥子团体？“癫狂与淫欲”？我相信以前有个这样子的团体。叫做“风暴斗篷”叛军。

String.Source: Well, I hope he charged right into the blade that felled him. Serves him right, for demanding I die lonely.
String.Dest: 好吧，我只希望他恰到好处地冲进了能砍翻他的乱剑丛中。别亏待他，不然我就不能孤独终老啦。

String.Source: It generally means they are on their way to propose to the person they love.
String.Dest: 这大体上意味着他们已经在向心爱的人求婚的路上了。

String.Source: Seeing those two till the fields and harvest crops speaks louder than anything I could ever say.
String.Dest: 看着那两个人锄地和收获庄稼比我说的任何话语都要响亮有力。

String.Source: Yes, for the time being. Only most people don't walk around with an Amulet of Mara when they go about their daily routine.
String.Dest: 是的，暂时是这样。只有当大多数人不戴着个玛拉的项链瞎转悠时，他们才会回到自己日常的生活中去。

String.Source: That isn't what I meant. The Nords are like Skyrim itself. Bleak and unforgiving winters that give way to verdant springs.
String.Dest: 我不是那个意思。诺德人就如同天际一样，令人充满痛苦回忆的寒冷的冬天终将被生机盎然的春天取代。

String.Source: That isn't what I meant. The Nords are like Skyrim itself. Bleak and unforgiving winters that give way to verdant springs.
String.Dest: 我不是那个意思。诺德人就如同天际一样，令人充满痛苦回忆的寒冷的冬天终将被生机盎然的春天取代。

String.Source: Your offensive insult aside, your question is valid. But he was not a Nord who gave credence to the idea that one's race or station defines them.
String.Dest: 你的无理侮辱先放一旁不说，你的问题很合理。但是他不是一个认为种族或者身份可以决定一切的诺德人。

String.Source: Your offensive insult aside, your question is valid. But he was not a Nord who gave credence to the idea that one's race or station defines them.
String.Dest: 你的无理侮辱先放一旁不说，你的问题很合理。但是他不是一个认为种族或者身份可以决定一切的诺德人。

String.Source: It was. But even if the war ended tomorrow and was followed by an eternity of peace, it would not bring the dead back to life.
String.Dest: 诚然.哪怕明日太阳升起之时，这片土地再无纷争，和平永世存续，那些在战争中湮没的英魂也不会活转而来。

String.Source: I often tell Rinori she needs to see the world, but the advice rings hollow when I myself can't seem to tear away from this city.
String.Dest: 我经常和莱欧纳说：她需要长长眼界, 可我自己似乎也无法对这座城挥泪而去，这建议总被她当成耳边风。

String.Source: It's things like that which make the Nords say I'm of questionable mind, when all they used to question were my morals.
String.Dest: 因为诺德人怀疑我的品行，所以诺德人都说我疑心重。

String.Source: I wish I knew what he was talking about, so I'd know never to do it again.
String.Dest: 我希望我能知道他在说些啥，这样我就知道我再也不用重复干这事儿了。

String.Source: His shoulders were dressed in the finest furs, and a golden amulet hung from his neck, the center set with a stone as blue as a summer day.
String.Dest: 他的肩膀披着最上乘的毛皮，颈上挂着金项链，坠子的中央嵌着一颗如夏日晴空般湛蓝的宝石。

String.Source: I never even noticed it was an Amulet of Mara around his neck.
String.Dest: 我甚至都没有注意到这个，他脖子上挂着的居然玛拉之链。

String.Source: Belyn won't let me anywhere near his wheat after I damaged nearly half his crop. It's not my fault the fool never showed me how.
String.Dest: 自从我差点毁了他半数庄稼之后，贝林再也不准许我靠近他的麦田了。真的不能怪我，谁让那个笨蛋都不教我一下。

String.Source: No, he didn't. Balrund was torn between his love for me and his responsibility to his family.
String.Dest: 不，他并没有。包伦德在他对我的爱意和他对家庭担负的责任之间苦苦挣扎。

String.Source: Very well.
String.Dest: 非常好。

String.Source: It turned out to be a temporary spell. For the fool was in love with his king, no matter how much I told him it was unrequited.
String.Dest: 结果却是一个临时的咒语。因为那个傻瓜义无反顾的爱上了他的国王，不论我怎么告诉他这是场求而不得的单相思。

String.Source: The rumor is so heinous I can't even repeat it. So I won't.
String.Dest: 谣言是那么恶毒我都没法复述它，是的我不能。

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened next?
String.Dest: 接下来发生了什么？

String.Source: Our affair was at its height in the weeks leading up to Torygg's death, but Balrund had yet to call off the wedding.
String.Dest: 我们的爱情本该在Torygg去世几个星期后开花结果，但是Balrund已经取消了婚礼。

String.Source: Thank you. I'm not so cynical that I can't appreciate your gesture of kindness.
String.Dest: 谢谢。我不是那种愤世嫉俗到不对你的友善举动表示感谢的家伙。

String.Source: They say the old Nord who comes by the Cornerclub is married to an Orc, but that's not the strangest part about their relationship.
String.Dest: 他们说那个得到酒吧的诺德老头和一个兽人结婚了，但那还是不他们关系中最奇怪的。

String.Source: Yet in the end he chose you.
String.Dest: 然而最后他选了你。

String.Source: Yet in the end he chose you.
String.Dest: 然而最后他选了你。

String.Source: A look of desire, a look of longing. The one we all long to see.
String.Dest: 苦苦期盼，万众瞩目。

String.Source: A look of desire, a look of longing. The one we all long to see.
String.Dest: 苦苦期盼，万众瞩目。

String.Source: I'd wait through this life and the next to see that look as well.
String.Dest: 这辈子看不够，我下辈子还要看。

String.Source: I'm surprised he wasn't spoken for.
String.Dest: 他什么都没说，真让我惊讶。

String.Source: I'm surprised he wasn't spoken for.
String.Dest: 他什么都没说，真让我惊讶。

String.Source: How so?
String.Dest: 怎么了？

String.Source: How so?
String.Dest: 怎么了？

String.Source: How so?
String.Dest: 怎么了？

String.Source: How so?
String.Dest: 怎么了？

String.Source: How so?
String.Dest: 怎么了？

String.Source: Well met.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: Aren't you married to Belyn Hlaalu?
String.Dest: 你不是和贝林．哈拉鲁结婚了么？

String.Source: Aren't you married to Belyn Hlaalu?
String.Dest: 你不是和贝林．哈拉鲁结婚了么？

String.Source: Aren't you married to Belyn Hlaalu?
String.Dest: 你不是和贝林．哈拉鲁结婚了么？

String.Source: Aren't you married to Belyn Hlaalu?
String.Dest: 你不是和贝林．哈拉鲁结婚了么？

String.Source: Wrong. Nords have no heart and it's a wonder how their blood moves around.
String.Dest: 不，诺德人没有心而他们的血液如何涌动也很奇特。

String.Source: Well said. Skyrim and its people are cold but passionate.
String.Dest: 说得好.天际省和他的人民很冷但是心很热。

String.Source: Well said. Skyrim and its people are cold but passionate.
String.Dest: 说得好.天际省和他的人民很冷但是心很热。

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: What did you do?
String.Dest: 你做了什么？

String.Source: Who was this man?
String.Dest: 这人是谁？

String.Source: Who was this man?
String.Dest: 这人是谁？

String.Source: Who was this man?
String.Dest: 这人是谁？

String.Source: Who was this man?
String.Dest: 这人是谁？

String.Source: Who was this man?
String.Dest: 这人是谁？

String.Source: You make excuses for the condition of the slums?
String.Dest: 你为贫民窟的生活条件找借口？

String.Source: You make excuses for the condition of the slums?
String.Dest: 你为贫民窟的生活条件找借口？

String.Source: You make excuses for the condition of the slums?
String.Dest: 你为贫民窟的生活条件找借口？

String.Source: You make excuses for the condition of the slums?
String.Dest: 你为贫民窟的生活条件找借口？

String.Source: You make excuses for the condition of the slums?
String.Dest: 你为贫民窟的生活条件找借口？

String.Source: You make excuses for the condition of the slums?
String.Dest: 你为贫民窟的生活条件找借口？

String.Source: You make excuses for the condition of the slums?
String.Dest: 你为贫民窟的生活条件找借口？

String.Source: I know the look he's talking about. Show your bottom teeth and squint 1 eye.
String.Dest: 我知道他说的是怎样的一张脸。露出你的下牙，把一只眼睛斜过来。

String.Source: I know the look he's talking about. Show your bottom teeth and squint 1 eye.
String.Dest: 我知道他说的是怎样的一张脸。露出你的下牙，把一只眼睛斜过来。

String.Source: I know the look he's talking about. Show your bottom teeth and squint 1 eye.
String.Dest: 我知道他说的是怎样的一张脸。露出你的下牙，把一只眼睛斜过来。

String.Source: Tell me more about Balrund. What happened after that day on the docks?
String.Dest: 告诉我包伦德的事，在港口那天之后发生了什么？

String.Source: Tell me more about Balrund. What happened after that day on the docks?
String.Dest: 告诉我包伦德的事，在港口那天之后发生了什么？

String.Source: Tell me more about Balrund. What happened after that day on the docks?
String.Dest: 告诉我包伦德的事，在港口那天之后发生了什么？

String.Source: Tell me more about Balrund. What happened after that day on the docks?
String.Dest: 告诉我包伦德的事，在港口那天之后发生了什么？

String.Source: There seem to be few tales of romance in Skyrim.
String.Dest: 天际省好像没什么浪漫故事。

String.Source: There seem to be few tales of romance in Skyrim.
String.Dest: 天际省好像没什么浪漫故事。

String.Source: There seem to be few tales of romance in Skyrim.
String.Dest: 天际省好像没什么浪漫故事。

String.Source: There seem to be few tales of romance in Skyrim.
String.Dest: 天际省好像没什么浪漫故事。

String.Source: There seem to be few tales of romance in Skyrim.
String.Dest: 天际省好像没什么浪漫故事。

String.Source: Wrong. Nords have no heart and it's a wonder how our blood moves around.
String.Dest: 错了，诺德人根本没有心，所以我们的血能流动就是一个奇迹。

String.Source: When all a lady wants is to put up her guard, yet can't help but feel completely defenseless.
String.Dest: 当一个女士一心保持戒备的时候却往往是最脆弱的时候.

String.Source: Not exactly. I imagine the look he spoke of was one of desire mixed with sadness.
String.Dest: 不完全是。我猜他说话时的表情是渴望而忧伤的。

String.Source: Until next time.
String.Dest: 下回见。

String.Source: Until next time.
String.Dest: 下回见。

String.Source: Farewell.
String.Dest: 再会。

String.Source: Yes, I surmised as much. The man should've been a bard the way he made every word a song.
String.Dest: 是啊，我也这么想。这个男人真应该成为一名吟遊诗人，就冲他能把每一句话都编曲唱出来这一点。

String.Source: It's not something I ever want to feel again.
String.Dest: 这不再是我想要的感觉了。

String.Source: That pride ultimately killed him, just as it slowly consumes me.
String.Dest: 荣誉几乎要了他的命，就像它正在缓慢地消耗着我一样。

String.Source: The war means preventing crime and rebuilding the Gray Quarter is a low priority. Not that it should be, but by all accounts Ulfric is a racist.
String.Dest: 战事说明打击犯罪和重建灰色居住区的优先级又被降低了。应该不会吧，但是我听说乌弗瑞克是一个种族主义者。

String.Source: For every desolate tundra, there are clear lakes and hidden grottos as lush and vibrant as the Ascadian Isles.
String.Dest: 在埃斯卡迪安岛区的每一个荒无人烟的苔原，都有着清澈的湖泊和隐秘的洞穴。郁郁葱葱，充满活力。

String.Source: We can then present the case that investigating crimes in the Gray Quarter will help his guards stay sharp.
String.Dest: 那么我们可以报告在灰域调查罪案会让他的警卫保持警惕。

String.Source: That is something every foolish, mad, and hopelessly desperate romantic can relate to.
String.Dest: 那是种跟任何愚昧，疯狂，绝望无助的浪漫都会联系上的【东西】。

String.Source: I still remember the day they sealed the front gate and rounded up the handful of Imperial soldiers who were visiting the city.
String.Dest: 我仍记得那一天他们封锁了前门，然后去围捕一些混进城来的帝国士兵。

String.Source: Beneath the icy veneer, in the privacy of our bedrooms and in our most intimate of thoughts, all mortals turn to those emotions that are timeless.
String.Dest: 冰冷的外表下隐藏着一颗亘古不变的心。

String.Source: I knew then that Ulfric had gone to Solitude not to plead for war, but to make it.
String.Dest: 我明白乌佛瑞克前往独孤城并不是去请求开战，而是直接挑起战端。

String.Source: House Hlaalu prided itself on the use of diplomacy as opposed to warfare. They were loyal to the Empire for centuries even before the Great War.
String.Dest: 哈拉鲁家族庆幸他们用了外交手段而不是发动战争。甚至在世界大战之前，他们就为帝国效忠了数世纪。

String.Source: Our crest was adorned with a scale, to represent the balance achieved by negotiation and compromise.
String.Dest: 我们的【头冠】被鳞片所装饰，这代表着通过谈判和妥协所达成的平衡。

String.Source: Yet you'll find more than your fair share of tales of hopelessness, sadness, and melancholy. That is something we Dunmer can relate to.
String.Dest: 然而你也尝到了这过度的绝望，悲伤，和惆怅。这点我们丹莫都深有体会。

String.Source: Well met.
String.Dest: 幸会。

String.Source: We alter our lives, our futures, and the fates of those around us, all on account of a single, fraction of a moment when everything is beautiful.
String.Dest: 我们会改变我们的生活，我们的未来，以及我们周围人的命运，所有的一切都是基于一件事。再只需一点点时间，一切都会美好万分了。

String.Source: Nevertheless, beneath it all, we are all mortals. We laugh, we love, and we cry.
String.Dest: 然而，在这之下，我们都是凡人。我们笑着，我们爱着，我们哭泣着。

String.Source: (Laughs) Yet it does seem your sense of humor remains intact.
String.Dest: (笑声) 看来你的幽默感还没丢。

String.Source: Skyrim is a cold land, and its people hewn from ice and stone. Some may see the surface and the edges, and mistake it for a lack of passion.
String.Dest: 天际省，这是一块严寒之地。她的人民由冰雪和坚石劈凿而成。有些人只肤浅地看到表面，误以为是这里的人们缺乏热情。

String.Source: Make it quick.
String.Dest: 有话快说。

String.Source: It was nothing more than a business arrangement, a wedding made to unite two clans who had long been at odds. That only made it worse.
String.Dest: 没有事情重要过这一场商务安排，一场将两个古老氏族联合起来的宴会。那样做只会让这件事变得更糟糕！

String.Source: In this case, he was promised to one of the Shatter-Shield daughters.
String.Dest: 在这种情况下，他答应了碎盾家的一个女儿。

String.Source: All right, then.
String.Dest: 那就这样吧。

String.Source: If we present it to him not as an act of charity, but an investment, we have a better chance of making our case heard.
String.Dest: 如果我们不把这个作为一种施舍给他，而是作为一项投资的话，我想我们的事情就更能为人所知了。

String.Source: Investigating crimes against Dunmer could provide valuable experience. Better living quarters could attract more business and wealth.
String.Dest: 对于反对黑暗精灵的调查可以给你一些有价值的经历。更好的住处可以吸引更多财富和生意.

String.Source: Be careful where you say such things. If the Nords have no heart, they aren't likely to have a sense of humor either.
String.Dest: 这种话不能乱说。要是诺德人没有心，他们很可能也没什么幽默感。

String.Source: So what recourse do we have given how little Ulfric cares? Some of my fellow Dunmer talk of taking to arms, as if that isn't exactly what he wants.
String.Dest: 那么我们能提供了什么援助能让乌佛瑞克哪怕有一点点在乎呢？一些我的丹莫朋友们谈过想动武，说的好像那不正是他想要的情况。

String.Source: I tried my best to ignore him, but the fool kept at it. I told him it would end in tears. He said he would never make me cry.
String.Dest: 我已经尽量无视他了，可那白痴不肯罢休。我告诉他最终肯定杯具。他说他绝不会让我流泪。

String.Source: Yet even had the Stormcloaks succeeded, it still would've meant the war was over, and more guards patrolling the streets.
String.Dest: 就算风暴斗篷胜利了，战争也不会结束，只会有更多的守卫在街上巡逻。

String.Source: He had not even met the Shatter-Shield sisters, nor had a decision been made regarding to whom he'd be betrothed.
String.Dest: 他甚至从未见过碎盾姐妹，他该和谁订婚也还没有决定。

String.Source: Ah, you enjoy a good romance then. There's never enough of it, and always too much. When hearts are that full they can't help but break in the end.
String.Dest: 啊，那好好享受你的浪漫吧。这事永远玩不够，而且总是会太过。当一颗心被装得那么满，到头来只会被撑破。

String.Source: It didn't take long for me to discover the Amulet of Mara was meant for another.
String.Dest: 没过多久我就发现原来玛拉护符是戴给别人看的。

String.Source: In the end, he chose the Stormcloaks over both. Nothing was as important to him as his pride as a Nord.
String.Dest: 最后，他还是选择了风暴斗篷阵营.对他来说，没有什么比作为一个诺德人更值得自豪了。

String.Source: The key to diplomacy and negotiation is not to appeal to your opponent's generosity, but to their selfishness.
String.Dest: 耍弄政治手腕的关键不是努力博取对手的同情，而是唤起他们心底的自私。

String.Source: Men are always making promises that are emptier than a beggar's pockets. Of course, I consider myself the bigger fool for believing him.
String.Dest: 相信男人那张嘴，毋宁相信这世上有鬼。但是，我宁愿安心地做一个相信他的大傻瓜。

String.Source: Greetings.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: We can argue that rebuilding the Gray Quarter will bring in wealthier citizens, a cleaner city, and more coin from taxes over time.
String.Dest: 我们可以搬出的来支持重建灰民区的论据有：我们会吸引更富有的市民，获得一个干净的城市，随着时间推移还能有更多税收进账。

String.Source: Such is the wine of love. It makes us all look like drunks.
String.Dest: 这是爱情之酿。它让我们看起来全像个醉鬼。

String.Source: No, we need to wait until Ulfric is dead or made High King. If it's the latter, he will be in a jovial mood, and more apt to hear our pleas.
String.Dest: 不，我们得等乌弗瑞克死了，或者坐上至高王再说。如果是后者的话，他再心情愉快的时候肯定会很容易听进我们的请求。

String.Source: He was. When someone dons an Amulet of Mara, they're usually on their way to propose.
String.Dest: 他是。当人们戴上了玛拉的护身符，他们通常就是以自己的方式在求婚。

String.Source: We said our goodbyes, and I never gave him a second look.
String.Dest: 我们说了再见，然后我再也没有看他一眼。

String.Source: Perhaps that bloodline is what makes me oppose Ulfric's rebellion, while at the same time makes excuses for him regarding the Gray Quarter.
String.Dest: 也许是我的血统让我反对乌佛瑞克的反叛, 但也是我的血统让我原谅他关于对灰色居住区的行为.

String.Source: We would cede the moral high ground, and give Ulfric reason to expunge the city of anyone but Nords.
String.Dest: 我们将会道德沦丧，这就给乌弗里克理由杀掉城里的所有非诺德人。

String.Source: When I looked at him it was like looking at a tapestry of stars, so bright, so beautiful, and always beyond my reach.
String.Dest: 当我看着他时如同看着星辰编织的织锦，如此明亮，如此美丽，如此的遥不可及。

String.Source: That night I set out to put down a bottle of ale and put him out of my mind. I had all but succeeded when he walked into the Cornerclub.
String.Dest: 那天晚上打算不去想着麦芽酒和那个家伙。结果当他走进酒吧时一切都砸锅了。

String.Source: Goodbye.
String.Dest: 再见。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: Something on your mind?
String.Dest: 你有什么心事吗？

String.Source: Belyn has some company coming over, and I'm afraid we don't have the space.
String.Dest: 贝林有一些同伴到这儿来，但我恐怕我们没有多少地方了。

String.Source: We've all been passing them around from home to home until they get settled. Lucky for Ambarys, we had to cut our turn short.
String.Dest: 我们把他们传送到一个又一个可以安家的地方一直到他们彻底的安定下来。幸运伴随着伦达，我们缩短了所需的路程。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: Something on your mind?
String.Dest: 有什么想法吗？

String.Source: Yes, Ambarys, it's about the twins. They've been so helpful, but I was wondering if they could spend another night here at the Cornerclub.
String.Dest: 是的，伦达，是关于双胞胎的。他们能帮上不少，但是我在想他们还会在拐角俱乐部里再待一晚吗？

String.Source: It's a shame as they've been so wonderful to have around the house.
String.Dest: 他们住在这么好的房子里可真是一种耻辱.

String.Source: Vampires?
String.Dest: 吸血鬼？

String.Source: Speak.
String.Dest: 说吧。

String.Source: What is it?
String.Dest: 怎么了？

String.Source: They're refugees from Morrowind, just arrived last week. Pleasant lads, the both of them.
String.Dest: 他们是来自晨风的难民，上周刚到这里。两人都是很讨人喜欢的小伙子。

String.Source: How can I help you?
String.Dest: 有什么我能效劳的？

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。
